name: 尚恒宇
content:
Return iterator to lower bound

Returns an iterator pointing to the first element in the range [first,last) which does not compare less than val.

From [http://www.cplusplus.com/re...](http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/algorithm/lower_bound/ "http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/algorithm/lower_bound/")

name: haoyu zhang
content:
ForwardIter lower\_bound(ForwardIter first, ForwardIter last,const \_Tp& val)算法返回一个非递减序列[first, last)中的第一个大于等于值val的位置。

应该是这个
